alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 9:12PM CDT until August 29 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity affecting Franklin Parish. For the Lower Ouachita...including Alto, Fort Necessity, Tendal, Newlight, Como, Clayton, Jonesville L&D, Acme...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 49.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 52.0 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 50.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Boeuf River Fort Necessit 50.0 49.3 Wed 8 pm CDT 51.6 51.9 51.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 915 AM CDT.
